pages.text: Netherite Tools and Armor can be improved with some specific items.$(br2)-Tools and Armor can be Sculkified with an Echo Shard, gaining better overall stats at the cost of durability.$(br2)-Tools can be upgraded with Rubys, gaining better attack speed and efficiency.

-Topaz can be used in both Tools and Armor to double their durabiity.$(br2)-You can further upgrade sculkified tools and armor to the Warden variant.$(br2)-If you regret sculkifying your netherite items you can use Amber gems to 'heal' your items.
